casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darren Wayne GENTLE 240A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 15, 2018 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Richard J. Costanza, Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Gentle, Darren Wayne.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of October 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of October 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 5th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
